intro: Psychotria hypargyraea, commonly known as the silverleaf psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves with a silvery underside, giving it its common name. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are often clustered together. Psychotria hypargyraea is typically found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and coastal areas.
